comment: Frutado, balanceado, um pouco de pêra

Duty Free - So probably $ 125 per bottle depending where u live.

Definitely well balanced with a Fruit sweetness and the sherry cask on the front.  Not overly hot at only 80 proof.
A little peatiness on the back end as the port whiskey lingers on your tongue.
Caramel golden brown and oaky tannins
Love it , a little more aging would create a divine result.
